name: TextNode_splitTextTest
description: Unit tests for the splitText method of the TextNode class.

test_cases.name: testSplitTextValidOffset
test_cases.description: Tests the splitText method with a valid offset.

test_cases.name: testSplitTextNegativeOffset
test_cases.description: Tests the splitText method with a negative offset, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testSplitTextOffsetGreaterThanLength
test_cases.description: Tests the splitText method with an offset greater than the length of the text, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
